banner.description:
With a background in Programming and Communication, and experience in digital consulting and development, I have worked on projects that integrate technology, communication, and service delivery.

Increasingly interested in issues of social impact, equity and sustainability, I am focusing my technical expertise on projects and public policies that advance digital transformation, inclusion, and innovation within public institutions and civil society.

Originally from Mexico City, I am fluent in English, Spanish, and Italian. Outside of work, I enjoy singing, volunteering, and taking long walks with my dog, Ofelia.
